Name: Truck Life
About the game: This a brand new truck simulation game, players will experience fun from a variety of truck driving. Drive around the original Chinese map, complete hundreds of specialty tasks through different cities. Meet in the mountains, rivers, lakes and seas. Come to share your truck life. Real driving experience From the convenient light truck to the handsome heavy semi, experience the different truck driving fun. Highly restored map scene Huge scale of map and cities, and present the original Chinese map and cities. Dynamic weather, seasonal changes, real-time lighting Based on the real simulated dynamic weather system, the climate changes in different latitude and longitude, and the scene changes in different seasons Dynamic logistics system Hundreds of specialty tasks, simulated cargo system which based on the city, time and season.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Truck Life? Check out the release date (Aug 6, 2020), developer insights from 惊叹号游戏工作室, and a complete game summary.
